title: Against Meaning. Ukrainian poetry in English translations
description:
This book is an anthology of young Ukrainian poetry (as it was in 2001, when it was published).

It contains poems with English translations, sometimes awkward ones, but still deserving attention.

Number of pages: 102

Authors:
Andriy Bondar
Serhiy Zhadan http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Serhiy_Zhadan
Vadym Koval
Halyna Kruk
Rostyslav Melnykiv
Serhiy Pantiuk
Halyna Petrosaniak
Roman Skyba
Nazar Fedorak
